lines.text: It might do you good to eat a little dust once in awhile.
I'm a lawyer, remember? I only eat crow.
Boy Howdy! I've got blisters in places I didn't even know I had places.
Well its no pride I got in him for a daddy, but its a proud name, and I'm gonna wear it. And Boy Howdy! People are gonna look up to me!
Untie me and I'll show you a little justice, Barkley style.
Now I have had me a day...!
When Nick is pushed, he pushes back with everything he has.
Nick, I promise never to call you a bull in a china shop again.
We get back in one piece, you can call me anything you like.
